original_text: These people tried to find their names in the lists of priests' families. But they could not find anything. So they could not serve as priests. These people tried to find their names in the lists of priests' families. But they could not find anything. So they could not serve as priests.
korean_text: 이 사람들은 계보 중에서 자기 이름을 찾아도 얻지 못하므로 그들을 부정하게 여겨 제사장의 직분을 행하지 못하게 하고

sentences.original_text: These people tried to find their names
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람들은 자신들의 이름을 찾으려고 했습니다

sentences.original_text: in the lists of priests' families
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장 가문의 명부에서

sentences.original_text: But they could not find anything
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 아무것도 찾을 수 없었습니다

sentences.original_text: So they could not serve as priests
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 제사장으로 봉사할 수 없었습니다
